ENSIS LEAF JUICE, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNAL EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, POLYSORBATE 20, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, DARUTOSIDE.
